title: Great idea but needs development
comment: EDIT 15/6/15 - Much improved, however I'm having problems setting my location and I can't find instructions in English showing me how to do it.

title: Fantastic idea implemented by Fantastic Human Beings!!
comment: Watching Herr Krauthausen on ARD this evening, I was SO impressed with the work his organization is doing to assist those with handicaps with the goal to reach the whole world for this project!  What a great idea to engage everyone through this app toward that effort.  As an American Diplomat, I will take this to all of the many places I travel to and also inform the local Embassy staff to download this app as well.   Awesome work and keep on keeping on for your wonderful cause!   Cheers!

title: Good
comment: It is a good app. I have a question,. How to delete a New POI.

title: Broken
comment: Great idea. The registration process is a little long winded. Good app and easy enough to use.

title: Latest update failed
comment: It is impossible to do the latest update because it is 'incorrectly signed'...
An update has just been released, please reinstall. And of course we look forward to a better rating.

title: Ok
comment: Not bad, but its lacking the features of the iPhone app. Still waiting for them despite a recent update...

title: Good idea shame it don't work
comment: Such a good idea yes it brings up places but no info as to accessibility means its useless unless u going round all to find 1 u can get in. Improve info or even make it so users can add their own n it will be great

title: Bad First Impression
comment: I installed it and launched it. It said "Network Unstable" and shut down. Uninstalled immediately. EVO 3D, Ice Cream Sandwich, Sprint, United States

title: Sad
comment: It is sad to say that this app is only good in Germany otherwise useless. Hope expands to America much needed app.
